title: Sonic 4 Episode 1 native resolution patch
description:
Place in your Sonic 4 Episode 1 installation directory. 
Usually, it is in C:/Program Files(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Sonic 4 Episode 1

This will replace your Sonic_vis executable. There's no need to back it up, as a Steam cache integrity verification will restore the original.

This will make your Sonic 4 Episode 1 render at whatever resolution you have set in your Sonic 4 Ep 1 config tool.
Be warned that it will disable Steam achievements for Sonic 4 Ep 1 while you are using this mod (but Steam will still log your playtime).

This mod was made by Jackfuste of WSGF forums.
More info in this thread: http://www.wsgf.org/forums/viewtopic.php?t=24190
